com.google.appengine.tools.mapreduce.impl.sort

Class SortShardTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appengine.tools.mapreduce.impl.WorkerShardTask<KeyValue<ByteBuffer,ByteBuffer>,KeyValue<ByteBuffer,List<ByteBuffer>>,SortContext>
      • com.google.appengine.tools.mapreduce.impl.sort.SortShardTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IncrementalTaskWithContext, IncrementalTask, Serializable

    public class SortShardTask
extends WorkerShardTask<KeyValue<ByteBuffer,ByteBuffer>,KeyValue<ByteBuffer,List<ByteBuffer>>,SortContext>
    Keeps accepting inputs and passing them to a SortWorker until the worker's buffer is full. Once this occurs endSlice is called which causes the data to be written out in sorted order.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
